resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106957</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106957</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208284</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Conducting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conduzir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Condotta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεύθυνση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El conducir</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The purpose of a music conductor is to rehearse larger groups of vocalists and/or instrumentalists and to keep them together musically during performance.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zweck eines Musikleiters ist, größere Gruppen
vocalists und/oder Instrumentalisten zu proben und sie musikalisch 
während der Leistung zusammen zu halten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le but d'un conducteur de musique est préparer de 
plus grands groupes de vocalists et/ou des instrumentalistes et de les
garder ensemble musicalement pendant l'exécution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A finalidade de um condutor da música é rehearse 
grupos maiores dos vocalists e/ou instrumentalists e mantê-los junto 
musical durante o desempenho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scopo di un conduttore di musica è di preparare
i più grandi gruppi dei vocalists e/o i instrumentalists e mantenerlo
insieme musicale durante le prestazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σκοπός ενός αγωγού μουσικής είναι να 
προετοιμαστούν οι μεγαλύτερες ομάδες αοιδών ή/και 
instrumentalists και να κρατηθούν μαζί μουσικά κατά τη 
διάρκεια της απόδοσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El propósito de un conductor de la música es 
ensayar grupos más grandes de vocalists y/o a instrumentalists y 
guardarlos juntos musicalmente durante funcionamiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
FN:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208284</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106957</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/conducting</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
